Diese Stelle teilen:

Upstream – next level mobility entwickelt die digitale Mobilitätsinfrastruktur für smarte Städte von Heute und Morgen. Bei uns zu arbeiten bedeutet, die Zukunft mit gesellschaftlichem Mehrwert aktiv mitzugestalten.

Das erwartet Sie

Weiterentwicklung einer modularen, konfigurierbaren Software-Plattform für Mobilitätsservices, Vertriebssysteme und Smart City Applikationen im nationalen und internationalen Raum
Entwicklung der neuen Features unter Anwendung einer geschichteten Microservice Architektur und Einsatz eines auf Spring Boot basierendem Technologie Stacks im agilen Delivery Team nach Scrum unter Anwendung von CI/CD
Deployment als skalierbare Applikation auf Kubernetes mit Anbindung an Elasticsearch und Bereitstellung von Applikationsmetriken in Prometheus, Nutzung von Kafka, Postgres und MongoDB (cloud agnostische, standardisierte Infrastruktur)
Erarbeitung von Verbesserungsvorschlägen und Wartung des eingesetzten Technologie Stacks
Aktiver Wissensaustausch mit allen Delivery Teams und punktuelle Teilnahme als Trainer in der Upstream IT-Academy

Das bringen Sie mit

Fortgeschrittene oder abgeschlossene IT-Ausbildung (HTL, Universität, FH, Fachkurs o.Ä.) oder gleichwertige Fortbildungen im Rahmen der bisherigen beruflichen Aktivitäten
Mindestens vier Jahre Berufserfahrung mit Java Entwicklungen, zusätzliche DevOps Erfahrung von Vorteil
Erfahrung im Umgang mit agilen Development bzw. Continuous Integration Tools (JIRA), sowie Kenntnisse über QM-Tools sind ebenfalls von Vorteil
Interesse an Infrastructure-as-a-Code basierend auf Terraform und Terragrunt mit Erfahrungen in der AWS, GCP und/oder Azure von Vorteil
Bereitschaft zur Fortbildung zum Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD) und/oder Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
Den Wunsch, gemeinsam mit der Wiener Stadtwerke-Gruppe, Wien klimafit für die Zukunft zu machen.

Das bieten wir Ihnen

Gehalt

Für diese Position bieten wir ein Mindestgehalt von EUR 4.032,00 brutto pro Monat, abhängig von Qualifikation und Berufserfahrung, sowie die Bereitschaft zur Überzahlung.

Arbeitsumfeld : Das beste technische Rüstzeug - State of the art IT-Ausstattung mit Laptop und Firmenhandy, sowie ein topmodernes Büro im Herzen Wiens.
Work-Life-Balance : Arbeitszeitmodelle so individuell wie das Leben – neben Gleitzeit und Home-Office ermöglichen wir auch berufliche Auszeiten, wie z.B. Sabbaticals.
Onboarding und Entwicklung : Gekommen um zu bleiben – vom Onboarding bis zu laufenden Weiterbildungsangeboten unterstützen wir das Erreichen beruflicher Ziele.
Events und Aktivitäten : Arbeiten mit Freund*innen – das ist unser Spirit. Wir fördern dies mit regelmäßigen gemeinsamen Aktivitäten und Ausflügen.
Gesundheit und Vorsorge : Gesund sein – wir fördern dies mit monatlichem Eversports-Budget, regelmäßigen Gesundheitsaktionen, sowie einer stark vergünstigten Gruppenkrankenversicherung.
Speisen und Getränke : Hungrig arbeitet es sich schwer - wir bieten vergünstigtes Mittagessen, gratis Obst für den Vitaminkick zwischendurch und besten Kaffee, so viel man trinken kann.
Vergünstigungen : Top Leistung verdient top Benefits - wir bieten eine kostenlose Jahreskarte für Wien, eine betriebliche Pensionsvorsorge, sowie diverse Vergünstigungen.

job_title: Become a professional Customer Success Partner (f/m/d) - Austria - powered by SAP Academy
job_description:
We help the world run better

Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

Das werden deine Aufgaben als Customer Success Partner (w/m/d) sein

Der Aufbau von Geschäftsbeziehungen ist Deine Passion? Du bist daran interessiert, den digitalen Wandel und die Einführung neuer Technologien bei Deinen Kunden zu beeinflussen? Eine Rolle, in der Du Kundenbeziehungen in einem schnelllebigen, technologischen Umfeld für eine der wertvollsten Marken der Welt vorantreiben und entwickeln, würde Dich erfüllen?

Als Customer Success Partner (CSP) innerhalb der SAP Academy for Customer Success bist Du verantwortlich für:

Erfolgreicher Abschluss eines 10-monatigen Lern- und Entwicklungsprogram, das Dich in Deiner Rolle als zukünftiger Customer Success Partner unterstützt - einer zentralen Funktion innerhalb unserer dynamischen Cloud Services Success (CSS) Organisation.
Werde Teil eines mehrdimensionalen Lernprogramms, einer Mischung auf Trainings und Praxiserfahrung mit den Schwerpunkten auf digitale Transformation, Geschäfts- und Technologieverständnis, Persönlichkeitsentwicklung im Business Kontext, Lösungs-/Branchenwissen und Tools/Prozessen. Lerne, wie Du über den gesamten Kundenlebenszyklus (Customer Value Journey) hinweg Mehrwert schaffen kannst, indem Du eine strategische Partnerschaft zu den Kunden aufbaust, post-sales Aktivitäten steuerst, und auch die Erweiterung- sowie das Neugeschäft mit unseren Kunden förderst.
Nach erfolgreichem Abschluss des Programms wirst Du in Deinem Business-Team eine Rolle als Customer Success Partner mit direkter Kundenverantwortung übernehmen und weiterhin Mentoring- und Coaching-Unterstützung erhalten, die Deine berufliche Entwicklung Wachstum vorantreiben.

CSP-Schwerpunktbereiche

Enterprise – RISE with SAP (E-CSP), Human Experience Management (HXM), Digital Supply Chain (DSC) und Intelligent Spend and Business Network (ISBN).

Ergreife mit uns die Chance ein globales Peer-Netzwerk aufzubauen, mit Kunden zusammenzuarbeiten und sie bei der Lösung ihrer einzigartigen, geschäftlichen Herausforderungen zu unterstützen sowie erstklassige Cloud-basierte Produkte und Services zu nutzen - und das alles bei einem großartigen Gehalt und Zusatzleistungen.

Das solltest Du mitbringen

1-3 Jahre Berufserfahrung mit nachweislicher Beteiligung am Kundenerfolg und an der Geschäftsentwicklung, vorzugsweise aus der Beratung oder dem Account Management, einschließlich Lösungs- und Eskalationsmanagement.
Ausgeprägte zwischenmenschliche und kommunikative Fähigkeiten, inklusive verhandlungssicherer Sprachkenntnisse in Englisch und Deutsch.
Nachgewiesene Fähigkeit zur Zusammenarbeit mit verschiedenen Interessengruppen und Unternehmensbereichen.
Ausgeprägter Geschäftssinn einschließlich nachgewiesener Kenntnisse über Geschäftsprozesse und/oder Branchen.

Über die SAP Academy for Customer Success

Die SAP Academy for Customer Success ist ein erstklassiges Trainingsprogramm, das die nächste Generation unserer Mitarbeitenden fördert, indem es Dir eine anregende und inspirierende Erfahrung in einem global vielfältigen Umfeld bietet. Dieses dynamische 10-monatige Programm stärkt die Grundlage für eine erfolgreiche Karriere bei SAP. Der offizielle Start des SAP Academy for Costumer Success Programms ist der 01. März 2024.

Während des Programms wirst Du in Deinen lokalen Markt eingearbeitet. Darüber hinaus erhältst Du innovative Unterrichtseinheiten in einer virtuellen Umgebung und On-the-Job Training, sowie Mentoring durch erfahrene CSPs aus dem Business. Du wirst die Möglichkeit haben, sowohl hinter den Kulissen als auch direkt mit Kunden zu arbeiten. Das Programm wird Dein Wissen über die Aufgaben von SAP und des CSP erweitern und Dir die fachliche Erfahrung vermitteln, die Du benötigst, um unsere Kunden in den Mittelpunkt zu stellen.

Nutze die Chance Deines Lebens, ein globales Peer-Netzwerk aufzubauen, mit Kunden zusammenzuarbeiten und sie bei der Lösung ihrer einzigartigen geschäftlichen Herausforderungen zu unterstützen sowie erstklassige Cloud-basierte Produkte und Services zu nutzen - und das alles bei einem konkurrenzfähigen Gehalt und Zusatzleistungen.

#SAPAcademyforCustomerSuccess #SAPCSPProgramG3

Überkollektivvertragliche Entlohnung ab € 51.100 brutto je nach konkreter Qualifikation.

Die SAP Academy for Customer Success ist zu einem hybriden Arbeitsmodell übergegangen, so dass die Tätigkeiten nach Rücksprache mit dem Manager sowohl in mobiler Arbeit als auch an einem SAP Dienstsitz ausgeübt werden. Es ist sehr wahrscheinlich, dass ein Teil (4-6 Wochen) des Programms Ende des dritten Quartals 2024 in San Ramon, Kalifornien, stattfinden wird. Diese Entscheidung wird im 1. Quartal 2024 getroffen.

Wir stellen uns Herausforderungen gemeinsam

SAP-Innovationen helfen mehr als 400.000 Kunden weltweit, effizienter zusammenzuarbeiten und Business Insight effektiver zu nutzen. SAP war ursprünglich für seine Führungsrolle in der ERP-Software (Enterprise Resource Planning) bekannt und hat sich zu einem Marktführer für End-to-End-Software für Geschäftsanwendungen und zugehörige Services für Datenbank, Analyse, intelligente Technologien und Erfahrungsmanagement entwickelt. Als Cloud-Unternehmen mit 200 Millionen Benutzern und mehr als 100.000 Mitarbeitern weltweit sind wir zielgerichtet und zukunftsorientiert, mit einer äußerst kollaborativen Teamethik und Engagement für die persönliche Entwicklung. Unabhängig davon, ob wir globale Branchen, Menschen oder Plattformen miteinander verbinden, stellen wir sicher, dass jede Herausforderung die Lösung erhält, die sie verdient. Bei SAP schaffen wir gemeinsam Durchbrüche.

Inklusion führt uns zum Erfolg

In unserer Kultur der Inklusion stehen Gesundheit und Wohlbefinden im Mittelpunkt. Flexible Arbeitsmodelle sorgen dafür, dass sich jede und jeder – unabhängig vom persönlichen Hintergrund – eingebunden fühlt und Bestleistungen erbringen kann. Wir bei SAP sind davon überzeugt, dass wir durch die einzigartigen Fähigkeiten und Qualitäten, die jede und jeder in unser Unternehmen einbringt, stärker werden. Wir investieren in unsere Mitarbeitenden, um ihr Selbstvertrauen zu stärken und ihnen dabei zu helfen, ihr volles Potenzial zu entfalten. Wir setzen auf die Förderung aller Talente, um eine bessere und gerechtere Welt zu schaffen.

SAP ist stolz darauf, als Arbeitgeber für Chancengleichheit einzustehen und diese aktiv zu fördern. Wir sind den Grundsätzen der Chancengleichheit im Beruf verpflichtet. Für Bewerberinnen und Bewerber mit physischen und/oder psychischen Beeinträchtigungen treffen wir geeignete Vorkehrungen. Wenn Sie an einer Bewerbung bei SAP interessiert sind und beim Navigieren auf unserer Website oder beim Ausfüllen der Bewerbung Unterstützung benötigen, senden Sie eine E-Mail mit Ihrer Anfrage an das Recruiting Operations Team in der jeweiligen Region: Careers@sap.com.

SAP Mitarbeiter:innen: Kandidat:innen können nur für unbefristete Stellen empfohlen werden – weitere Regelungen findet Ihr in der SAP Referral Policy. Für Ausbildungsstellen können spezielle Regelungen Anwendung finden.

Requisition ID: 373635 | Funktionsbereich: Sales | Reisetätigkeit: 0 - 100% | Karrierestatus: Berufserfahren | Anstellungsverhältnis: Vollzeit, unbefristet

We build breakthroughs together

SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

We win with inclusion

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

Perfect English skills are mandatory
Dedicated personality and strong team player with high level of self-management

Our client offers:

job_title: Lead/Staff Data Scientist – Fraud (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
job_description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know Our Team

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

The Opportunity

We are looking for ambitious and agile data scientists that would like to seize the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging productive machine learning and big data platforms worldwide, processing some 600B events every day and making some 5B predictions.

As part of the Data Science and Machine Learning (AI/ML) team you will be exposed to real-world challenges such as: dynamic pricing, predicting customer intents in real time, ranking search results to maximize lifetime value, classifying and deep learning content and personalization signals from unstructured data such as images and text, making personalized recommendations, innovating algorithm-supported promotions and products for supply partners, discovering insights from big data, and innovating the user experience. To tackle these challenges, you will have the opportunity to work on one of the world’s largest ML infrastructure employing dozens of GPUs working in parallel, 30K+ CPU cores and 150TB of memory.

In This Role, You’ll Get to

Design, code, experiment and implement models and algorithms to maximize customer experience, supply side value, business outcomes, and infrastructure readiness
Mine a big data of hundreds of millions of customers and more than 600M daily user generated events, supplier and pricing data, and discover actionable insights to drive improvements and innovation
Work with developers and a variety of business owners to deliver daily results with the best quality
Research discover and harness new ideas that can make a difference

What You’ll Need To Succeed

4+ years hands-on data science experience
Excellent understanding of AI/ML/DL and Statistics, as well as coding proficiency using related open source libraries and frameworks
Significant proficiency in SQL and languages like Python, PySpark and/or Scala
Can lead, work independently as well as play a key role in a team
Good communication and interpersonal skills for working in a multicultural work environment

It’s Great if You Have

PhD or MSc in Computer Science / Operations Research / Statistics or other quantitative fields
Experience in NLP, image processing and/or recommendation systems
Hands on experience in data engineering, working with big data framework like Spark/Hadoop
Experience in data science for e-commerce and/or OTA

We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

#sanfrancisco #newyork #seattle #boston #washdc #sydney #melbourne #perth #paris #london #tokyo #dhaka #vienna #edinburgh #manchester #amsterdam #munich #berlin #toronto #vancouver #moscow #dublin #seoul #hcmc #singapore #ENG #IT #4

Equal Opportunity Employer

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.

We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .

To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

You are deep into cloud native computing and love the challenges which come with orchestrating workloads in such an environment? We believe that automation is the key enabler for engineering teams to move fast successfully. With your expertise and passion, you will be part of a platform engineering team. Together with the team of highly skilled engineers you will be shaping the developer experience for more than 1000 software engineers.

Job Description

Kubernetes I Cloud Native I Autonomous Cloud I Continuous Delivery I Release Automation | GitOps | Platform Engineering

Taking ownership of product components, implementing new features, maintaining them, and keeping your team’s technical debt small
Building a self-service Kubernetes platform for software promotion by leveraging different tools/languages like Helm, Argo CD, Argo Workflow, Golang, Bash, etc.
Ensuring that delivering and releasing software on our Cloud-based Kubernetes platform works like a charm for development teams by following GitOps principles
Driving architectural and design decisions regarding components owned by your team
Staying on top of technology trends and assessing them for impact on owned components
Adopt new cloud technologies and best practices to improve product quality, and team performance

Qualifications

Minimum of 3 years of experience in DevOps, Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure
Technical studies related to software engineering (or similar)
Hands-on team player with experience in ensuring high-quality standards in critical software components, clean code principles, and design patterns
Knowledge and experience in software lifecycle with CI/CD, and modern DevOps/automation processes
Experience with hyperscalers (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP,etc.)
Experience with Terraform, Crossplane, ArgoCD, or Istio
Proficient in at least one programming language (Python, Go, or Java)
Excited to learn new technologies and challenge the status quo

Additional Information

What's in it for you?

A one-product software company creating real value for the largest enterprises and millions of end customers globally, striving for a world where software works perfectly.
Working with the latest technologies and at the forefront of innovation in tech on scale; but also, in other areas like marketing, design, or research.
Working models that offer you the flexibility you need, ranging from full remote options to hybrid ones combining home and in-office work.
A team that thinks outside the box, welcomes unconventional ideas, and pushes boundaries.
An environment that fosters innovation, enables creative collaboration, and allows you to grow.
A globally unique and tailor-made career development program recognizing your potential, promoting your strengths, and supporting you in achieving your career goals.
A truly international mindset that is being shaped by the diverse personalities, expertise, and backgrounds of our global team.
A relocation team that is eager to help you start your journey to a new country, always there to support and by your side.
Attractive compensation packages and stock purchase options with numerous benefits and advantages.

Compensation And Rewards

We offer attractive compensation packages and stock purchase options with numerous benefits and advantages.
Due to legal reasons, we are obliged to disclose the minimum salary for this position, which is € 56,000 gross per year based on full-time employment. We offer a higher salary in line with qualifications and experience.

Anna Wolff
The cars of the past were guided by human hands – the cars of the future will be driven by human ideas
The cars of the past were guided by human hands – the cars of the future will be driven by human ideas
In the quest towards full automation, we have set out to tackle the toughest challenge of autonomous driving – safety. Our trusted safety platform is on board more than one million vehicles. If you come work with TTTech Auto in Vienna, your ideas will be, too.

Embedded Software Developer – Integration (m/f/d)

You are passionate about embedded challenges and your eyes light up when dealing with cutting edge technologies and autonomous driving? Great – our System team is waiting for you in an international and dynamic environment to reach the next level!

Your Tasks
Work in the frame of Classic and Adaptive AUTOSAR for use in embedded automotive systems
Focus on safety critical real time systems based on high-end SoCs, microcontrollers, and state-of-the-art operating systems including Microsar, QNX and Linux
Taking over responsibilities along the whole software lifecycle, e.g. specification, design, development, testing and integration
Sharing and broadening your knowledge and experiences within your team, providing guidance for software projects and creating new ideas together

Your Profile
Profound education in a relevant field of study - preferably with reference to computer science
Classic and/or Adaptive AUTOSAR knowledge is needed for modelling and integration activities in development environments
Experience of working on POSIX systems (QNX, Linux)
Knowledge of the C++ 11/14 standard is an advantage
Experience with embedded systems and knowledge of automotive domain standards and practices is an advantage
Experience of Python, C and/or C++ development is an advantage
Motivated and committed team player with solution-oriented working style and curiosity for innovation
Good communication skills in English

Our Offer
Exciting work environment – be part of future high-tech innovations and cutting-edge technologies
We are a team – flat hierarchies, open door policy, communication at eye level and a hands-on mentality
Technical Expertise – work among fellow technical experts and minds that will inspire you
Benefits Package – lunch tickets, job tickets (unlimited use of public transport in Vienna or partially reimbursement of costs for KlimaTicket), numerous discounts, events and much more
Diversity & equal opportunities ­– our team consists of people from over 60 countries, speaking 100 different languages. Diversity and inclusion are in our DNA
Work-life-balance – additional days off, home office, workcation (up to 45 workdays per year Mobile Working within the EU) and individual working time models

As of today, TTTech Group employs more than 2,300 people in 14 locations worldwide. TTTech Auto, as part of TTTech Group, consists of more than 1,100 employees in 9 locations worldwide. Join our pioneering team and become part of our fascinating projects. You will find it #mindgrowing

We provide an attractive and performance-based salary, which is based on your qualifications and professional experience. This position is subject to the Collective Agreement for Employees in the Metal Trade (“Kollektivvertrag für Angestellte Metallgewerbe”) and we offer a minimum salary of € 49,000.- gross per year. Actual compensation can be well above this standard.

Job description:

In our Electric & Automation department in Vienna we are searching for an Automation Engineer (m/f/d).
 Your Tasks
Independent role in basic and detail engineering for automation systems hard- and software design
Responsibility for control and regulation functions of machinery and process technology
Conception and programming of application software
Optimization and maintaining of existing solutions as well as the development of new, innovative solutions for the technical and economic improvement of systems and processes
Testing and commissioning of our systems as well as training and instruction of our international customers in our test fields, workshops and on job sites
Handling of as built documentation and manuals in regard of engineered application software and functions
  

Profile description:

Completed technical education (college or university) in the field of electrical engineering / automation technology or similar
At least 3 years of practical experience in automation technology
Good knowledge of modern PLC technology like Siemens (S7 400/1500, TIA, WinCC, PCS7) / Rockwell (ControlLogix, Factory Talk)
Good knowledge of modern Drives Systems and their control like, Siemens, ABB, Rockwell or process instrumentation are beneficial
Structured and solution-oriented way of thinking and analytical approach
Responsible and independent way of working
Intercultural openness, strong communication skills
Team player, flexible working in international project teams

 Our Offer
Andritz AG offers a secure job in an innovative and international company with long-term development opportunities.
Talent & leadership programs
Flexible working time model

 In Austria we are legally obliged to announce at least a gross monthly salary of € 3.790,58 for this position. Depending on qualifications and professional experience we offer you a market-based salary.

Entain is one of the world’s largest Sports Betting and Gaming groups, operating both online and in the retail sector. With offices across five continents and licenses in more than 25 countries, we operate some of the most well-known and iconic brands in the industry with more than 250 years of combined history – names such as bwin, Coral, Foxy, Gala, Ladbrokes, and PartyPoker.

The Role In a Nutshell

As Automation Engineer - Linux you will join one of our Engineering Teams responsible for high performance and high available IT Environment. You’ll support given applications in terms of automation, operations, maintenance, deployments. For our complex environment it’s key that our applications in production run smoothly. You’ll need to ensure a fast resolution of incidents. Further, you’ll automate the roll-out of new versions for applications and services.

Are you ready for solving incredibly complex problems in a-typical environments? We bet you are.

Joining a team of talented individuals, you will be passionate about technology and your enthusiasm and energy will transpire to your work!

What You’ll Be Doing

Support & maintain Java based applications.
Manage multiple installations of a wide variety of NoSQL databases and messaging middleware.
Champion observability by maintaining, adapting and improving monitoring and reporting (OpenTelemetry, Prometheus, Grafana, AppDynamics).
Set-up, optimize and fine tune application environments.
Contribute to continuous improvement of operating processes (deployment capabilities, GitOps).
Advise and support product developing teams as well as infrastructure teams on all topics.
Supports implementation of standards and best practices working closely with the architecture team.
Improve system performance, application delivery and efficiency through, automation, process refinement, post-mortem reviews, and in-depth configuration analysis.
Optimization and application fine-tuning alongside software engineers.
Participate in on-call rotation as 2nd & 3rd line of incident support (additionally compensated on top of base salary!)
What we need from you:

Deep understanding of the Linux operating system.
Hands-on experience managing and deploying Linux based applications.
Hands-on experience with technologies in our stack:
NoSQL DBs: Cassandra, Redis, Neo4J, SOLR, MongoDB
Automation Frameworks: Ansible, RunDeck
Enterprise Messaging & Supporting Software: Apache Kafka, Confluent Kafka, TIBCO EMS, ZooKeeper
Monitoring & Alerting Tools: AppDynamics, ELK Stack + Beats, Prometheus & Grafana, SCOM
CDN / DNS Solutions: Cloudflare, AD DNS, F5 GTM
Experience with automation & configuration management (Ansible or similar).
Strong scripting skills (Bash).
Good application server skills (in at least on of: JBoss, Jetty, Tomcat).
Basic programming experience in Java or Node.js is a plus.
Fluent English - written and spoken, German is a plus.
Self-driven personality who is eager to learn.
Good communication and training skills.
What we can offer you:

Salary - Dependent on experience, but with a minimum of €50,000
Hybrid working – We offer 3 days a week working from home.
Flexible benefits package - Annual bonus, employee share scheme, health screening, life assurance, matching pension contributions, lunch vouchers, 5 weeks annual leave per year, retail discounts, discounted gym membership, with the ability to tailor your benefits package to suit your needs.
Development – Both personal and professional development are important to us. Everyone gets 5 paid days to focus on development, along with subscriptions to learning resources like cross knowledge, LinkedIn learning and our own learning room. Monthly Empower Talks from inspirational leaders from outside the industry.
Onboarding - We've an experienced team who will help you get settled into your role, and you'll have all the support you need
Culture – We were once a startup and still have that growth mindset (despite our size). Our industry is renowned for the speed it operates at, and the incredible pace of innovation. Our values include winning together, being bold, exciting customers and driving innovation.
Wellbeing – Our employee assistance program offers free advice on everything from work advice, relationship advice, legal information, and financial advice. Everyone gets a free subscription to the unmind (mental wellbeing) app. Counselling session are available through EAP. We have a monthly schedule of wellbeing sessions and talks with each office having wellbeing champions and coordinators. Furthermore, we have a company doctor as well as a work psychologist coming to the office.
Offices - Newly refurbished offices, with chillout spaces and modern facilities (free coffee, tea, water and fresh fruits)
Social - Fantastic programme of free social activities, from our summer parties and Friday night drinks, we've got you covered.
Sports - We're as passionate about sports as you are, if you can name a sport, we've probably got a company team.

“The minimum basic salary for this position would be set at 50k €. Depending on experience and qualifications, there is a willingness to offer more. In addition, we offer annual bonus and stock options. Furthermore, if working on call you will receive additionally an on-call allowance.”

About Entain

We may sit on the FTSE100, but for millions of customers worldwide, we’re the brands they hold in their hands – and heart. As the home of household names like Ladbrokes, Foxy and PartyPoker, to name just a few, we elevate lives with moments of excitement. And right now we’re elevating ourselves above the competition. We’re leading the industry in bold new directions - and it’s our diverse and talented team who are making this possible. Believe us, the best is yet to come. For our customers. For our future. For your career.

DEI and Wellbeing @ Entain

Our vision is to be the world leader in betting, gaming and interactive entertainment, and we know that the most successful businesses are the most sustainable ones. Diversity and inclusion is key to sustainability and success and our goal is to attract, engage and retain the best talent globally, bringing the best thinking to our business from inside and outside of our sector. Our ambition is to make sure everyone at Entain feels valued, respected and included. Inclusion is embedded in everything we do, because we know when we feel respected and heard, we do our best work. Sustainability drives everything we do, and doing what’s right is one of our core values. Diverse teams have more creativity, imagination, innovation and problem solving capabilities. We are committed to tackling inequalities and creating a diverse and inclusive business. Here, we celebrate our individual differences, and make sure everyone feels supported, respected, and empowered to thrive – and that starts from the moment you apply to join us. We want our employees to feel healthy and supported at home and at work. That’s why we have our Well-me programme, which provides information, tools and training to help our people look after their mental and physical wellbeing in ways that matter to them.

Life @ Entain

We’re a team who love to play, and win, together. We love building bonds between our people, and we love to build your career up too. Join us, and we won’t just be your employer, we’ll be your biggest cheerleader. We’ll give you the power to lead the conversation on your learning and career goals from day one, and then get behind you with all the support you need to take your career – and our business – to new heights.

job_title: Senior Data Scientist/Senior Machine Learning Engineer (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
job_description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know Our Team

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

The Opportunity

We are looking for ambitious and agile data scientists that would like to seize the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging productive machine learning and big data platforms worldwide, processing some 600B events every day and making some 5B predictions.

As part of the Data Science and Machine Learning (AI/ML) team you will be exposed to real-world challenges such as: dynamic pricing, predicting customer intents in real time, ranking search results to maximize lifetime value, classifying and deep learning content and personalization signals from unstructured data such as images and text, making personalized recommendations, innovating algorithm-supported promotions and products for supply partners, discovering insights from big data, and innovating the user experience. To tackle these challenges, you will have the opportunity to work on one of the world’s largest ML infrastructure employing dozens of GPUs working in parallel, 30K+ CPU cores and 150TB of memory.

In This Role, You’ll Get to

Design, code, experiment and implement models and algorithms to maximize customer experience, supply side value, business outcomes, and infrastructure readiness
Mine a big data of hundreds of millions of customers and more than 600M daily user generated events, supplier and pricing data, and discover actionable insights to drive improvements and innovation
Work with developers and a variety of business owners to deliver daily results with the best quality
Research discover and harness new ideas that can make a difference

What You’ll Need To Succeed

4+ years hands-on data science experience
Excellent understanding of AI/ML/DL and Statistics, as well as coding proficiency using related open source libraries and frameworks
Significant proficiency in SQL and languages like Python, PySpark and/or Scala
Can lead, work independently as well as play a key role in a team
Good communication and interpersonal skills for working in a multicultural work environment

It’s Great if You Have

PhD or MSc in Computer Science / Operations Research / Statistics or other quantitative fields
Experience in NLP, image processing and/or recommendation systems
Hands on experience in data engineering, working with big data framework like Spark/Hadoop
Experience in data science for e-commerce and/or OTA

We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

#sanfrancisco #newyork #seattle #boston #washdc #sydney #melbourne #perth #paris #london #tokyo #dhaka #vienna #edinburgh #manchester #amsterdam #munich #berlin #toronto #vancouver #moscow #dublin #seoul #hcmc #singapore #ENG #IT #4

Equal Opportunity Employer

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.

We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .

To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Sie begeistern Installateure und Planer von unseren Produkten und Systemen.

Als Verkäufer/in pflegen Sie bestehende Kundenbeziehungen und gewinnen neue Kunden hinzu.

Wir freuen uns aber ebenso über Quereinsteiger/innen aus dem Installationshandwerk.

Zu Ihren persönlichen Stärken zählen Ihre überzeugende Kommunikation, Verhandlungsgeschick und kundenorientiertes Denken.

Kompetente Unterstützung durch unser starkes Innen- und Außendienstteam

Job Description

Node.js I TypeScript | Tooling | Ease of Use

Contribution to the tools that make custom apps for our AppEngine possible
Working on the powerful CLI and custom-made SDKs and APIs
Evolving the UI of the newly developed Visual Studio Code Extension that will simplify the path from zero to production for our engineers and customers

Qualifications

3+ years of experience working with TypeScript/Node.js
Understanding of the developer tools ecosystem (Esbuild, Node.js, npm)
Passion for frontend development with one of the following frameworks React, Nextjs, or Remix
Feeling comfortable by diving into new technology
Professional experience and knowledge of Visual Studio Code Extension development is a plus
Passion for enabling people with innovative tools to do their best work, and a sharp focus on the end-user experience

Additional Information

A one-product software company creating real value for the largest enterprises and millions of end customers globally, striving for a world where software works perfectly.
Working with the latest technologies and at the forefront of innovation in tech on scale; but also, in other areas like marketing, design, or research.
Working models that offer you the flexibility you need, ranging from full remote options to hybrid ones combining home and in-office work.

A relocation team that is eager to help you start your journey to a new country, always there to support and by your side.  If you need to relocate for a position you are applying for, we offer you a relocation allowance and support with your visa, work permit, accommodation, language courses, as well as a dedicated buddy program.

Compensation And Rewards

We offer attractive compensation packages and stock purchase options with numerous benefits and advantages.

Due to legal reasons, we are obliged to disclose the minimum salary for this position, which is € 45,500 gross per year based on full-time employment. We offer a higher salary in line with qualifications and experience.

OVERVIEW:
ANSR is a global leader in establishing & operating Global Capability Centers (GCCs) for global enterprises. Enterprises across industries and markets have relied to ANSR's expertise in building world class technology and innovation capabilities in India and Eastern Europe. ANSR's unique industry leading approach enables our clients to integrate digital platform capabilities and global teams within the enterprise Global Capability Centers. Since its inception, ANSR has established over
80 GCCs aggregating to over 85k enterprise talent with over $1.6B in investment and using over 8M sq. ft of workspace. ANSR provides a comprehensive suite of end-to-end GCC services from design and set-up consulting to talent, infrastructure, and business support services, assuring enterprise integration and operational excellence. The GCCs established by ANSR include some of the best managed and impactful GCCs in the industry.
Full Stack Developer
Position Responsibilities:
• Understands and develops software solutions to meet end user's requirements.
• Ensures that application integrates with overall system architecture, utilizing standard IT lifecycle methodologies and tools.
• Develops algorithms, data and process models, plans interfaces that are digitally and cloud native for use in construction of solutions of varying complexities.
• Develops product roadmaps in alignment to business strategy fulfilment.
• Ability to influence architectural decisions to adopt modern technologies and evangelize about the same.
• Ability to prove through proof of concepts and technical research and presentation the best fit amongst emergent technologies to upend business outcomes.
• Understands broad based system integrations and interoperability.
• Involved in every stage of the software development lifecycle from requirements to server deployment, including DevOps and DevSecOps.
Required Skills / Experience:
• Ability to design and write clean, maintainable code, using some (or all) of the languages and frameworks we love: Java, JavaScript, Spring Boot, NodeJS, Hibernate etc.
• Strong knowledge & coding experience in Java, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Microservices development using Rest framework.
• Good to have skills/experience in: Groovy/Grails, Hibernate, React Js, NodeJS, NextJS and other front-end development technologies.
• Additionally, working knowledge with atleast two of the following preferred: PostgreSQL, Git, Tomcat, Docker, Jenkins among others
• Value a culture of continuous learning, improvement and experimentation
• Implement modern engineering practices to ensure product quality (e.g., test driven development, test automation, CI/CD practices)

• Ability to work effectively in a collaborative agile environment.
• Ability to design and build for cloud platforms, including leveraging micro services and containers.
• Collaborate closely with engineers on other teams and in other disciplines.
• Provide mentorship and technical leadership for project teams and peers.
• Build resilient, scalable systems that can readily evolve into the future.
• Constantly striving to deliver value to our customers.
Requirements:
• Ideally has experience of building enterprise B2B applications.
• 4+ years’ experience shipping production code.
• Ability to work with minimal supervision, bring your own ideas to software design and development.
• Someone with excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, capable of conversing with international team members.
• A team player with a willingness to lend a hand with any aspect of the Company’s activity in addition to the core task of software development.

Im kleinen Team setzt du innovative Lösungen um und gestaltest dabei aktiv mit. 
Du bringst dein Know-how dabei in den unterschiedlichsten Bereichen wie der Entwicklung der Fahrzeugsoftware oder der zentralen Flottensteuerungssoftware ein.
Du bist sowohl in der Neu- und Weiterentwicklung unserer Produkte, aber auch in der Umsetzung von Projekten bei renommierten Kunden involviert.
 #youareknapp
Du begeisterst dich für die industriereife Umsetzung wissenschaftlicher Themen aus dem Umfeld der mobilen Robotik. Die Themengebiete sind dabei breit gestreut und umfassen Bereiche wie Sensorfusion, Lokalisierung und Navigation, Steuerung und Regelung von Hardwarekomponenten, Machine-Learning und AI, aber auch die Entwicklung von Tools und User-Interfaces.
Idealerweise konntest du bereits praktische Erfahrungen in der Entwicklung mit C++ sammeln.

Das Betriebssystem Linux ist dir bekannt.
Die gemeinsame Entwicklung in kleinen, fokussierten Teams sagt dir zu. 
Idealerweise hast du bereits praktische Erfahrung im Entwicklungsprozess mit Tools wie GIT, GitLab, Docker, usw.
Du verfügst über sehr gute Deutsch- oder Englischkenntnisse
Neben deiner Kommunikationsstärke, Selbstständigkeit und Eigeninitiative zeichnen dich deine Genauigkeit und dein Ideenreichtum, sowie deine Vorliebe schwierige Probleme zu lösen aus.

Das Gehalt wird individuell berechnet und wir bieten eine marktkonforme Bezahlung in Abhängigkeit von Ihrer Qualifikation und Vorerfahrung.

Full Time

Are you ready for new challenges in an international and innovation-driven environment where you can make a difference? Apply and join our team, be curious, learn, grow, and develop your career together with us. We promise: you are in for a special ride!

The location of the role is in: Vienna Austria

About the job
In this position, you will directly report to the Head of IT Platform Services. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining cloud-based infrastructure and services in a hybrid environment (Microsoft AZURE and On-premises). As a Cloud Platform Engineer, you will be involved in international IT projects and will closely collaborate with software development teams to integrate cloud services into applications. To minimize downtime on customer activities you will also identify and resolve issues with cloud infrastructure. With your strong knowledge of cloud architecture and services you will be supporting internal customers regarding cloud and on-premises IT solutions. You will be actively involved in implementing, managing, monitoring, and alerting tools to ensure the availability and performance of cloud-based applications and services in a global team.

In addition, your tasks will include
Ensuring the security of the cloud infrastructure by implementing best practices for access control, encryption, and vulnerability management
Creating and maintaining automated deployment pipelines for applications and services
Configuring and managing cloud-based services such as computing, storage, networking, and databases
Engineering of systems administration-related solutions for various project and operational needs
Developing and maintaining documentation for the cloud infrastructure and services (documents, procedures, technical knowledge transfer) as well as the related operational processes.

About You
You are a strong communicator with a collaborative attitude. You can ensure clear and effective communication of operational matters, project updates, and activity status. With your great enthusiasm and creative mindset, you bring new ideas to the table, not only as an individual but also together with your colleagues. You work well in cross-functional teams and are not afraid to take responsibility and make decisions. With your hands-on mentality, structured approach and analytical skills, you proactively seek to improve the status quo. You see change as something positive, can adapt quickly and you like to courageously help shaping the future of RHI Magnesita.

What we expect from you in terms of
Education, knowledge & skills
Bachelor’s degree in information technology or any field of similar relevance
Extensive knowledge in "Infrastructure as Code" in the cloud environment (ARM templates, Azure Bicep, Azure DevOps Pipelines, Ansible)
Knowledge of Infrastructure as Code technologies (ARM-Templates, Bicep, Terraform)

Languages
English – Proficient/Fluent
German language skills will be considered a valuable asset

Work Experience
Several years of experience with Cloud Platform Environments (Microsoft Azure)
Experience with CI / CD automation, ideally with Microsoft Azure DevOps
Basic programming experience (Powershell, Linux BASH, or similar)
Proficiency with Infrastructure Pipelining Tools (AzureDevOps-Pipelines, Github Actions)

Why you should work for RHI Magnesita
You will perform in a customer focused environment. We live innovation and appreciate an open and pragmatic way of working. From our leaders we expect to drive our further transformation, to engage our people and to give direction. RHI Magnesita is a company where you can be yourself and where not only your resume and experience, but also your personality counts. We aim for global consistency in compensation policies, but also consider local common practices. RHI Magnesita is committed to support its employees through various means to enable the best possible performance.

We offer
Attractive remuneration packages including global bonus programme
Local benefits such as public transport annual pass (Wiener Linien), our own RHI Magnesite Café on site and daily meal allowance for numerous eateries (Europlaza)
A variety of health offers (platform for mental & physical health, sponsoring of sports events etc.) and our own Corporate Benefits platform
RHIM Academy for your ongoing learning & development, incl. full LinkedIn Learning catalogue
Possibility of up to 50% home office (depending on the position) incl. allowance
Flexible and trust-based working time

This position is open to all levels, i.e., junior, and intermediate candidates. The annual gross salary for this position ranges from € 45,000 to € 70,000 on a full-time basis, depending on your qualification, experience, as well as the amount of overtime. We will make sure to offer you a competitive salary package that values your relevant background and that’s in line with market values.

Sounds like you?
At RHI Magnesita everyone is welcome and encouraged to apply. We evaluate applications based on required qualifications and regardless of gender identity, nationality, ethnic origin, religion, disability, age, sexual orientation, marital or partnership status. At RHI Magnesita we appreciate the value of diverse teams.

We kindly ask you to submit your application online and in English. Due to data privacy reasons, applications via e-mail cannot be taken into consideration. Should you have any questions about this position, please contact us at: talent.europe@rhimagnesita.com. Should you have any questions or queries about the position please feel free to reach out to Rene Vallant our Head of IT Platform Services at +4369918705391

Agencies may only submit candidates for positions for which they have been invited to do so by the Head of Talent Acquisition Europe. All unsolicited resumes sent to us will be considered property of RHI Magnesita and our company will not be held liable to pay a placement fee.

About RHI Magnesita
We are the acknowledged technology leader in the refractory industry. Our company is defined by people. We are committed to diversity and know that multiple approaches, perspectives and backgrounds fuel creativity and innovation. It is our aspiration to build a workplace culture where everyone feels valued, engages, and can enjoy a truly inclusive environment and the diverse voices of our employees are heard. We foster a collaborative culture that cherishes ideas and determination to add value for our customers. Our leadership style encourages open-mindedness, reliability, pragmatism, and innovation.

job_title: DevOps Engineer IoT/ Site Reliability Engineer IT with homeoffice/flexible working hours/ice cream/pizza in full or part time (gn)
job_description:
We are grandcentrix. We make IoT happen.

Join a tech-excited team and populate the Internet of things with us. As a 200-strong grandcentrix, we develop innovative IoT solutions fully from product idea to app. We have grown with successful customer projects and have not only brought the popular Toniebox safely into children's rooms worldwide, but also networked the first washing machine with Miele. With Vodafone as a strong partner, we continue to operate independently, are agile, fast and also develop our own IoT products comprising software, hardware and connectivity. For example, we digitize supply networks (gas, water, electricity) via smart metering, make consumption plannable and immediately detect costly leaks. We are enthusiastic, curious and proud of what we do - apply now and make the world smarter with us!

Not in the mood for marketing platitudes? ;-) Here is the link to our engineering page: grandcentrix.team



What the job brings


Be the administrator of the cloud infrastructure for our own IoT products and our customers' IoT solutions - you will have a lot of freedom to implement your ideas
You will support the software developers and project teams and proactively contribute to lively discussions; your basic understanding of code will help you to do this
The further development of a state-of-the-art platform is given decisive impetus by your technical skills and your concepts
We learn from each other and are constantly working on new, exciting topics
Maintenance and improvement of our CI/CD pipelines, including the automation of workflows and processes of recurring tasks

What you bring


3 years of professional experience in the DevOps / SRE area as well as a degree or an apprenticeship, e.g. as an IT specialist
You live Infrastructure as Code (we use Terraform here)
GitOps experience with Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure, GCP, AWS)
Enthusiasm for new technologies, IoT and desire to drive innovation with a lot of freedom
Experience in monitoring applications (e.g. with Grafana)

That's on top

An attractive gross annual salary of between € 50,000 to 80,000
Flexible working hours, overtime regulations and an unlimited number of home office days, which you can even spend 20 days per year as a workation in other EU countries
Go green - if you decide to buy a Deutschlandticket or a Jobrad, we will reward you with 30,-€ extra per month
Work with state-of-the-art tools on a MacBook Pro or ThinkPad (Windows or Linux) incl. admin rights
We'll top up your parental allowance, so you can spend valuable time with your family
Vodafone products of your choice (e.g. a cell phone contract) worth € 40 per month and participation in the Family & Friends program
Develop yourself through the individual promotion of your personal development - your salary is also an annual issue with us
Attractive office buildings in Cologne and Dortmund - work from the roof terrace, for example, and enjoy an ice cream for free at the same time
...and of course, the usual standards, such as 30 days of vacation, many events (MeetUps, lightning talks, summer/Christmas party, after-works, and much more), above-average subsidies for the company pension scheme, fresh fruit, drinks and coffee flat, Corporate Benefits, awo lifebalance, Gympass, underground car park with e-charging points

With us, you can think out loud in any direction, we are not afraid of unusual ideas. It doesn't matter whether you are already a specialist in your field or just on your way to becoming one. Be yourself! We don't care where you come from, where you go, what you look like, how old you are, what gender you are or what religion you belong to. We are a diverse organization, so English is our corporate language.


We look forward to receiving your application. To make it easy for you, all we need is a resume or link to your Xing or LinkedIn profile. Feel free to contact us at jobs@grandcentrix.net with any questions.

job_description:
Direct message the job poster from myTalentscout GmbH
Alexander Ullrich
Tech-Recruiting | Big Data | AI | Web3 | NFT-Addicted | Crypto | Design | Art
🥨Unser Lieblingskunde und Münchner Nachbar, ein wahres Tech-Dreamteam und mit rund 90 Mitarbeitenden, auch kein unbeschriebenes (Minz-)Blatt 🍃 mehr in der Techszene, sucht ein:e Python Fullstack Developer:inn (+ React) als neue Verstärkung für seine "Data Crew”. 📀
Wenn du, wie der Erfinder der Sprache ein großer Fan von gutem Humor bist, passt das gut, denn in diesem IT-Haus geht es locker und humorvoll zu – Dreamteam eben! 🎳
Alles außer Schwachsinn ist hier technologisch geboten – hoch modern der TechStack, einschließlich Python/React, Testing, Docker, AWS und extrem agiler Arbeitsweise. Technologisch, professionell und menschlich einfach eine geniale Company mit hybrider, flexibler Officekultur (jede:r wie er/sie mag ✌🏼)!
🛠 Die engagierte Data-Truppe (2 Data Analysten, 1 KI-Experten + 1 Python Developer) ist quasi das Herzstück des Unternehmens, da sie maßgeblich an der Effizienz- und Produktivitätssteigerung des gesamten Unternehmens beteiligt sind. Sie erstellt individuelle Dashboards für alle anderen Teams des Unternehmens, anhand der (von den Teams) zur Verfügung gestellten Datenpipelines. Die Dashboards wollen sie zukünftig auf React migrieren. Hierbei wirst du an der Architektur und an neuen aufregenden Features maßgeblich beteiligt sein.
👩🏽‍💻 Wir suchen jemanden mit bereits mehrjähriger Erfahrung in der Webentwicklung mit Python und mit Fullstack-Mindset. Du solltest dich zudem mit React auskennen. Das Team liebt klare Kommunikation, den regen Austausch von Ideen und ist begeistert von agiler Arbeitsweise. Wenn du ein echter "Agile"-Fan bist und gerne in einem teamorientierten Umfeld arbeitest, passt du perfekt in die Crew.
Die Rahmenbedingungen: Definitiv the bright side of worklife! 🥳
- 100% Remote-Arbeit oder die Möglichkeit, hybrid in München zu arbeiten. 🏡
- Flexible Arbeitszeiten, die zu deinem Leben passen. 🧘🏼‍♂️
- Ein moderner Techstack mit immer neuen Technologien 🕹
- Ein agiles Arbeitsumfeld und eine agile Denkweise, die Innovation fördert. 💡
- Die Gelegenheit, an eigenen Produkten zu arbeiten und deine Ideen umzusetzen. 🎨
- Diverse Benefits, einschließlich Essenszuschuss, Fitnesszuschuss und Aktienanteilen. 📈
- Regelmäßige Mitarbeitergespräche, um deine berufliche Entwicklung zu unterstützen. 🤝
- 30 Tage Urlaub, damit du dich gut erholen kannst. 🏖
- Ein wettbewerbsfähiges Einstiegsgehalt von 65.000 bis 80.000+ €/p.a., abhängig von deinem Erfahrungsniveau. 💰
😂 Monty Python Legende John Cleese sagte mal: „Ich bin beeindruckt, wie Lachen die Menschen verbindet!“
☀️ Er wäre sicher noch beeindruckt wie sehr Lachen, Leidenschaft für einen Beruf und funktionierendes, agiles Teamwork Menschen verbindet. Hast du Lust dich selbst zu überzeugen? Bewirb dich und wir helfen dir es rauszufinden!
😁Wir freuen uns dich kennenzulernen und sind für all deine Fragen und Wünsche da!
Deine myTalentscout Crew 🌵

job_title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer (Singapore-based, relocation provided)
job_description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know Our Team

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

The Opportunity

We are looking for ambitious and agile data scientists that would like to seize the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging productive machine learning and big data platforms worldwide, processing some 600B events every day and making some 5B predictions.

As part of the Data Science and Machine Learning (AI/ML) team you will be exposed to real-world challenges such as: dynamic pricing, predicting customer intents in real time, ranking search results to maximize lifetime value, classifying and deep learning content and personalization signals from unstructured data such as images and text, making personalized recommendations, innovating algorithm-supported promotions and products for supply partners, discovering insights from big data, and innovating the user experience. To tackle these challenges, you will have the opportunity to work on one of the world’s largest ML infrastructure employing dozens of GPUs working in parallel, 30K+ CPU cores and 150TB of memory.

In This Role, You’ll Get to

Design, code, experiment and implement models and algorithms to maximize customer experience, supply side value, business outcomes, and infrastructure readiness
Mine a big data of hundreds of millions of customers and more than 600M daily user generated events, supplier and pricing data, and discover actionable insights to drive improvements and innovation
Work with developers and a variety of business owners to deliver daily results with the best quality
Research discover and harness new ideas that can make a difference

What You’ll Need To Succeed

4+ years hands-on data science experience
Excellent understanding of AI/ML/DL and Statistics, as well as coding proficiency using related open source libraries and frameworks
Significant proficiency in SQL and languages like Python, PySpark and/or Scala
Can lead, work independently as well as play a key role in a team
Good communication and interpersonal skills for working in a multicultural work environment

It’s Great if You Have

PhD or MSc in Computer Science / Operations Research / Statistics or other quantitative fields
Experience in NLP, image processing and/or recommendation systems
Hands on experience in data engineering, working with big data framework like Spark/Hadoop
Experience in data science for e-commerce and/or OTA

We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

Equal Opportunity Employer

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.

We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .

To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

We sponsor visa for non EU applicants
The digitization of healthcare marketing within the medical field in Europe and internationally is a truly exciting field to be a part of. We at medicalvision have BIG plans and are looking for interesting personalities who, with their commitment and know-how, want to work with us to shape the future of healthcare.
medicalvision GmbH in Essen-Werden, is an advertising agency with over 40 employees and more than 30 years of experience in the healthcare sector. Our European and international clients are market leaders in the fields of medical technology, diagnostics, pharmacy and (medical) cosmetics. They trust us with a wide range of projects – from small, individual projects to product launches all the way up to complex, wide-reaching campaigns, both on- and offline.

medicalvision is currently looking for someone to support our Digital and Online Team as a Fullstack Developer.

Your tasks
Together with our team you develop individual web apps with the help of frameworks such as Laravel. Additionally you can develop simpler microsites / landing pages for events and campaigns
Support the team in technical conception and programming of new features in existing apps
Testing and commissioning of new software components
Evaluation and integration of new technologies

Your profile
Advanced programming knowledge in PHP and experience with PHP frameworks
Routine in handling of databases and interfaces
Confident handling of HTML5, CSS3, SASS / LESS and JavaScript (ES6)
Experience with Javascript frameworks (reactJS, vue.js) is a plus
Experience with version control systems (GIT)
The use of project management software like Jira is nothing new for you
Competent in German and English (both spoken and written)
A great personality with a strong sense of teamwork!

We offer
Working in an established agency on innovative projects
Independent work in a committed, multifaceted team
A permanent position with 30 vacation days and flexible working hours
A modern office with ergonomic equipment and access to good public transportation
Coffee, cappuccino, latte macchiato and espresso

Wir suchen dein Talent und deine Leidenschaft zur Verstärkung unserer Data & Analytics Expert:innen. Schließ dich uns an, entfalte Deine Fähigkeiten und Talente und stecke unsere Community mit Deiner Begeisterung und deinen Ideen an. Was uns wichtig ist? Die 3 W’s: Wissensaustausch, Weiterbildungen und Weiterentwicklung. Interessiert? Dann wird’s jetzt spannend

Analyse fachlicher Anforderungen und Ableitungen analytischer Zielsetzungen für Kunden
Zusammenhänge komplexer Geschäftsdaten erzeugen und diese in performanten Reports visualisieren
Self-Service Datenanalysen gestalten sowie die Datenvorverarbeitung
Konsolidierung von Daten zur Ableitung angemessener Handlungsempfehlungen

Dieses Wissen bietet unseren Kund:innen echten Mehrwert. Du bist das Bindeglied zwischen IT und Business. Du konzipierst. Du realisierst. Du treibst voran.

Masterabschluss, vorzugsweise in (Wirtschafts-) Informatik, Wirtschaftswissenschaften, Wirtschaftsingenieurwesen oder einer vergleichbaren Studienrichtung

Verhandlungssichere Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse
Reisebereitschaft innerhalb der DACH Region

Benefits

Wir bieten Dir eine Kultur, die von unseren Führungsleitsätzen angetrieben wird: Unternehmerisch, ergebnisorientiert, Eigenverantwortung fördernd und sich gegenseitig zum Erfolg verhelfend. Wir schaffen Transparenz über Unternehmensziele, Zusammenarbeit und Unterstützung durch ein internationales Team auf Augenhöhe. Wir leben Austausch, Teamgeist und einen respektvollen Umgang miteinander. Das verbindet uns hierarchieübergreifend – auch im Home-Office. So erhielten wir in 2022 die kununu Auszeichnung „TOP Company“.

Das erwartet Dich bei uns:

Onboarding: Du bist ab dem ersten Tag intern vernetzt: Welcome Day, Hello Drink, Mentoring-Programm
Entwicklung: Entwicklung ist bei uns individuell auf Deine Stärken ausgerichtet: Regelmäßige Feedbackgespräche, Karrierepfade, Career Committees, Online Trainingskatalog, Internationales Arbeiten mit unterschiedlichen Kulturen
Work-Life Balance: Raum für Deine persönliche Lebensplanung (Sabbatical, Remote Working aus dem Ausland, hochflexible Arbeitsmodelle, Elternzeitprogramme, 30 Tage Urlaub, Feiertagskalender Baden-Württemberg)
Nachhaltigkeit: Uns ist es wichtig, dass unsere Arbeit einen positiven Einfluss auf die Umwelt und die Menschheit hat. Dafür machen wir unsere Lösungen und unsere Zusammenarbeit jeden Tag ein Stückchen nachhaltiger.
Events: Fachlich und mit Spaßfaktor (Summer-Tech-Event, lokale Afterworks, Sportevents, Teamevents, Weihnachtsfeiern)
Netzwerken: Connecte Dich mit Deinen Kolleg:innen: Communities, Lunch Breaks, interne Know-How Sessions
Fehlerkultur: Mache Fehler und teste Dich aus: Wir geben Dir den Freiraum neuesten Technologien zu arbeiten
Prämien: Eine Vielzahl an Prämien für Dein zusätzliches Engagement
Weitere Vorteile: Corporate Benefits, Jobfahrrad, betriebliches Gesundheitsmanagement

Are you a data scientist, machine learning engineer, or DevOps engineer with excellent programming skills, strong problem-solving abilities, a leadership track record, and a passion for developing tech solutions using cutting-edge technologies? Have you spent your career building game-changing software/hardware? Most importantly, are you looking to build a disruptive tech venture in the vibrant ecosystem of Munich? If so, we would like to hear from you!

Antler is a global early-stage VC enabling and investing in exceptional entrepreneurs. In Berlin and beyond, we bring together entrepreneurs with diverse and complementary backgrounds to build the defining companies of tomorrow. From experienced business operators to technologists and serial entrepreneurs, we work with skilled founders regardless of background or geography. We are present in 25 locations worldwide, have supported 5,000+ founders through our residency, invested in 850+ startups, and received over 175,000+ applications.

From day one, we provide access to an unrivaled set of co-founders, strong ecosystem, network and expertise to support exceptional founders building what will define tomorrow.
Having invested in hundreds of companies and worked with thousands of entrepreneurs, we know what works and what doesn't. This helps us better support you on your founding journey and maximize your chance of success. Whether you have built your own company before or are looking to found a company for the first time, tomorrow’s most impactful company could be built by you.


Details of the residency

1. The residency runs for an initial 10 weeks, full-time in Munich and starts on the 25th of September 2023.

2. In the pre-investment phase (10 weeks), you will ideate and find your co-founder(s) from the cohort of 50-70 founders.

3. After two months you will present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. If selected, you will receive a pre-seed investment of €100k for 10% equity.

4. If you get an investment, you will continue to be part of the residency for another 3 months throughout Antler will work closely with you to accelerate your growth. Antler will also arrange a Portfolio Day and provide you with fundraising support.


Who are we looking for?

Founders that join the residency come from a variety of backgrounds and have an assortment of skills and expertise. The residency will facilitate you and your co-founder to quickly build on an idea (either you come with an idea or you will be defining it with your team). If you enjoy a fast-paced, diverse, demanding, and incredibly engaging environment, join us!

We look for people with:

Inner drive: You're a self-starter and can motivate yourself and others to join your mission. You set high goals and have proven to achieve them.
A clear spike: That strong attribute which enables your skills and experiences to stand out from the crowd. You have deep knowledge in an area where you can form a foundation of your company's competitive advantage.
Grit: Your source of energy never runs low. You always find a window when the door closes. You have the willingness and ability to keep going when you're faced with obstacles.

What Antler will provide

Help finding your co-founder(s)
Personalized coaching sessions with business experts
Shared office space with access to various amenities
Access to a global network of start-up advisors and experts in their field
Potential investment at the pre-seed stage
